content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction point at position(y)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position y)

### Iron plate factory at position(z)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position z)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x to assembling machine at position z

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, crafting Iron Gear Wheel requires 2 iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it.
